Funds are required to be realigned within the Research, Development, Test, and Evaluation, \Defense-wide, 23/24, appropriation to PE 0605797D8Z (Maintaining Technology Advantage) from PE 0305186D8Z (Policy R&D Programs) for the proper execution of an FY 2023 congressional increase for

Funds are transferred from the Research, Development, Test, and Evaluation, Defense-wide, 23/24, appropriation to the Research, Development, Test, and Evaluation, Navy, 23/24, appropriation for the proper execution of an FY 2023 congressional increase for power and thermal management subsystem technologies for high-energy laser activities. This action does not change the purpose for which the funds were originally appropriated. This is a congressional special interest item.
